preference.name: MEGANTTDefaultEditMode
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default edit mode used on startup of a Gantt chart viewer. Valid Values: full_edit_mode - Specifies the full edit mode to be used on startup of a Gantt chart viewer. In the full edit mode, you can use the toolbar buttons to edit the elements in the Gantt chart viewer. restricted_edit_mode - Specifies the restricted edit mode to be used on startup of a Gantt chart viewer. In the restricted edit mode, you can still change the duration of an element using the context menu of the element.
